wikipedia_page.main: Stephen Wakeling (born 4 October 1983) is an English Middleweight Muay Thai kickboxer, fighting out of Kent, England. He is former British, European and four time World Muay Thai champion.

response: He was slated to fight Edwin Aguilar at Lion Fight 9 in Las Vegas on March 15, 2013Lion Fight 9 - Fights Announced: Marcus vs. Levin, Ross, Schilling, van SoestSimon Marcus vs. Artem Levin official for Lion Fight 9; Tiffany Van Soest, Kevin Ross, and Joe Schilling all in action as well  but was denied a license due to medical concerns by the Nevada State Athletic Commission.Joe Schilling no longer fighting at Lion Fight 9 against Edwin Aguilar It was also reported that he would face Steven Wakeling under Oriental kickboxing rules at GLORY 5: London in London, England on March 23, 2013Joe Schilling vs. Steve Wakeling Slated for GLORY 5 London but he was replaced by his old foe Simon Marcus in that bout after rejecting the contract from GLORY.GLORY 5 London Fight Card
